channel.title: Adding Objects
channel.description: Well, In my server I need to add an object (likes boxes or shelves) in order to block a portal. I was just wondering how to do this? I tried searching but didnt find anything. Thanks

item.title: Adding Objects
item.dc:creator: @twinpkk02 twinpkk02
item.description:
@twinpkk02 wrote:

so if you want the object the opposite way it is at 0 which is west-east just put in there -5 and its north-west

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Objects
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

this would be the corrected code of his

makeglobalobject(2344, 3435, 5555, 0, 10);

the 0 is the direction the object is facing.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Objects
item.dc:creator: @twinpkk02 twinpkk02
item.description:
@twinpkk02 wrote:

ok go into your client.java and search makeglobalobject

you will see a long list like this

makeglobalobject(2344, 3435, 5555, 0, 0)

ok well just copy and paste one of them and edit it like this

makeglobalobject(x coord, y coord, Object Id, 0, 0)

do it for all the objects you need :)>

Read full topic
